1.text: These were the sons of David who were born to him in Hebron: The firstborn was Amnon by Ahinoam of Jezreel; the second was Daniel by Abigail of Carmel;

2.text: the third was Absalom the son of Maacah daughter of King Talmai of Geshur; the fourth was Adonijah the son of Haggith;

3.text: the fifth was Shephatiah by Abital; and the sixth was Ithream by his wife Eglah.

4.text: These six sons were born to David in Hebron, where he reigned seven years and six months. And David reigned in Jerusalem thirty-three years,

5.text: and these sons were born to him in Jerusalem: Shimea, Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon. These four were born to him by Bathsheba daughter of Ammiel.

6.text: David’s other sons were Ibhar, Elishua, Eliphelet,

8.text: Elishama, Eliada, and Eliphelet—nine in all.

9.text: These were all the sons of David, besides the sons by his concubines. And Tamar was their sister.

10.text: Solomon’s son was Rehoboam: Abijah was his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,

11.text: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,

12.text: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,

13.text: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,

14.text: Amon his son, and Josiah his son.

15.text: The sons of Josiah: Johanan was the firstborn, Jehoiakim the second, Zedekiah the third, and Shallum the fourth.

16.text: The successors of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, and Zedekiah.

17.text: The descendants of Jeconiah the captive: Shealtiel his son,

18.text: Malchiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.

19.text: The sons of Pedaiah: Zerubbabel and Shimei. The children of Zerubbabel: Meshullam and Hananiah, their sister Shelomith,

20.text: and five others: Hashubah, Ohel, Berechiah, Hasadiah, and Jushab-hesed.

21.text: The descendants of Hananiah: Pelatiah, Jeshaiah, and the sons of Rephaiah, of Arnan, of Obadiah, and of Shecaniah.

22.text: The six descendants of Shecaniah were Shemaiah and his sons: Hattush, Igal, Bariah, Neariah, and Shaphat.

23.text: The sons of Neariah: Elioenai, Hizkiah, and Azrikam—three in all.

24.text: The sons of Elioenai: Hodaviah, Eliashib, Pelaiah, Akkub, Johanan, Delaiah, and Anani—seven in all.
